text:
Live

Here’s our look at the Trump administration and the rest of Washington:
title: U.S. orders Russia to close diplomatic offices in three cities

og.title: U.S. orders Russia to close diplomatic offices in three cities
og.description: Here's our look at the Trump administration and the rest of Washington:Moscow ordered to close offices in San Francisco, New York and WashingtonSpecial counsel has lobbyist at 2016 meeting with Trump Jr. testify to grand jury President Trump kicks off fall campaign for tax cuts, still without any…

twitter.description: Here's our look at the Trump administration and the rest of Washington:Moscow ordered to close offices in San Francisco, New York and WashingtonSpecial counsel has lobbyist at 2016 meeting with Trump Jr. testify to grand jury President Trump kicks off fall campaign for tax cuts, still without any planTrump gets criticism from the man he called 'my African-American'
twitter.title: U.S. orders Russia to close diplomatic offices in three cities

meta_data.description: Here's our look at the Trump administration and the rest of Washington:Moscow ordered to close offices in San Francisco, New York and WashingtonSpecial counsel has lobbyist at 2016 meeting with Trump Jr. testify to grand jury President Trump kicks off fall campaign for tax cuts, still without any planTrump gets criticism from the man he called 'my African-American'
